text: Advance Wars is not only one of my favorite GBA games, it's one of my favorite games ever. I would lump AW2 and AWDS in there as well. I would give a lot of money for a new game on Switch with its portability. The gameplay is close to perfection, making it extremely addicting and satisfying. I really miss this series!
author: SupraDarky

text: SupraDarky Just last week I ordered two copies of Dual Strike for me and my roommate. That games replayability is through the roof! I only wish that it was part of the 3DS Virtual Console so it's a little easier to obtain nowadays.
